creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: swath of curving foliage across top of fan with blossoms at center; five-lined inscription at bottom center with rectangular relief stamp at UR of text and two square relief stamps at LL of text; mounted to white cardboard
markings: R of center: rectangular intaglio (?); L center two square (?) reliefs; on mount, LLC, in pencil: [451]; on back of mount, LRQ, in pencil: [Baigai]
title: Orchid and Poetic Couplet
